about.text: We are your trusted partner for solutions and efficient automotive lighting solutions. Since 2016, we have been a leading automotive accessories sales and distribution company, ensuring quality and reliability with every delivery.

second.name: Field of activity
second.value: Sales and distribution of automotive accessories

description.text: TrustQuality specializes in supplying high-quality automotive wipers and bulbs for a wide range of vehicles. Our main goal is to ensure safety and comfort on the road by providing clients with access to the most modern and reliable automotive accessories.

benefits.text: TrustQuality only offers quality products and provides a 12-month warranty on almost all products.

first.name: Wipers
first.value: We offer wipers for all types of weather conditions, including summer, winter, and hybrid wipers. They provide excellent moisture removal and enhance visibility during rain and snow.

second.name: Automotive Lamps
second.value: Our lamps provide bright and even lighting of the road, enhancing safety during night trips. We have lamps of various types, including halogen and LED.

first.name: Wide Assortment
first.value: We offer a rich selection of wipers and lamps of various types, sizes, and models to satisfy the needs of all car owners.

second.name: Quality
second.value: TrustQuality works only with leading manufacturers known for their reliability and quality of products. All goods undergo strict quality control.

third.name: Professional Advice
third.value: Our experts are always ready to provide advice on choosing the most suitable wipers, automotive lamps, and accessories, taking into account the brand and model of your vehicle.

fourth.name: Delivery
fourth.value: We provide convenient delivery options throughout Kazakhstan and the CIS to make the purchase process as comfortable as possible for customers.

fifth.name: Prices and Promotions
fifth.value: We always have current prices and special offers for our customers. We strive to make our products accessible to a wide audience.

about.last_text: We are proud to help motorists ensure safety and comfort on the roads. TrustQuality – trust in quality

contacts.first: For partnership inquiries across Kazakhstan and the CIS countries
contacts.second: For partnership inquiries in the city of Astana
contacts.third: For partnership inquiries with the retail outlet at Bayanaul district 57a, Carsiti Shopping Center, 2nd tier, boutique 236
contacts.fourth: For partnership inquiries in the city of Almaty
